alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Southeast Van Buren County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Van Buren and southwestern Cleburne Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 328 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sugar Loaf Recreation Area, or near Fairfield Bay, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Quitman... Damascus... Higden... Fairbanks... Whipple... Fairfield Bay Marina... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Choctaw... Bee Branch... Edgemont... Southside in Van Buren County... Morganton... South Fork Recreation Area... Pearson... Narrows Marina... Choctow Recreation Area... Eden Isle... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
